scripts.build: node ./scripts/fix-prisma-url.mjs && prisma generate && cross-env PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE=binary NITRO_PRESET=vercel NODE_ENV=production nuxt build
scripts.vercel-build: node ./scripts/fix-prisma-url.mjs && prisma generate && cross-env PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE=binary NODE_ENV=production NUXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE=/api NITRO_PRESET=vercel nuxt build
